original_text: Then the soldiers also fixed two robbers to crosses near to Jesus. One robber was at Jesus' right side, and one was at his left side.
korean_text: 이 때에 예수와 함께 강도 둘이 십자가에 못 박히니 하나는 우편에, 하나는 좌편에 있더라

sentences.original_text: Then the soldiers also fixed two robbers to crosses
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 군인들 또한 두 강도를 십자가에 못 박았고

sentences.original_text: One robber was at Jesus' right side,
and one was at his left side.
